file_content.text: Still alive. Not for long, though--if you want to talk, make it fast.
He sings his last song. Say what you have to say.
I'm sorry, sir. He's dying. If there's anything we need to ask....
He's too far gone. I'd finish the interrogation quickly.
I can't feel my hands. I think I'm dying.
I need to know if you've seen an SIS agent. Code name "Hunter."
What...? The SIS--he went to Colony Control before we lost contact.
I don't know if he made it out. But now it's sealed up tight, no one could make it past--past....
No one could make it past what? Where's Colony Control?
What's blocking it off?
I can't. I just can't....
Hold still. I have some painkillers.
I can try to heal you.
Not enough. But thank you.
Colony Control. You've been very helpful, officer.
That's all I need. [Kill him]
I don't get queasy, but even I've got limits. Let's find your guy and get out.
We should go. We should find the one responsible.
I know they're Republic, sir, but--can we avenge them anyway?
I haven't seen this many dead since the last war. Let's find your friend.
It stinks in here. Cripes... what happened?
There is death here, and the radiation of the stars shines through.
That's--ugh. Can you smell that? Those are bodies....
This explains why the colony isn't communicating. Trace toxin particles in the air... not enough to have killed these people.
Stop right there, you slime. No Imperial sets foot in my home.
Last I heard, Isen Four surrendered to the Empire. What's going on?
What happened here?
Huh. Like you don't know?
You're in no condition to threaten me. Put down the blaster and let's talk.
Maybe you should negotiate.
Not after what you did.
Your colony surrendered. The Republic won't protect you.
Idiot. [Subdue him]
And you think you can threaten me? Tell me what's going on.
Piece of filth....
Someone sabotaged Colony Control. It started two hours after the surrender.
First the tram accident. Then the air filters, and the decompression... assassin protocols in the medical droids!
We surrendered... why did you do it?
Whoever's behind this wasn't one of ours.
The Empire isn't responsible.
Then who?
I can't help you like this. But we can work together.
Please calm down.
I'm the one asking questions. Are you going to cooperate?
Shut up.
I think I'd rather die.
Sedative administered. Lethal overdose possible.
